PageDescription: Join ONLYOFFICE reseller program to earn money by selling the word's #1 online office suite.
HeroTitle: ONLYOFFICE reseller program: <0>robust solutions and fair terms</0>
HeroText: We create perfect online document editors and corporate collaboration tools. You grow your customer base and make a profit.
PortfolioText: ONLYOFFICE is popular and trusted: over 15 million people in 170 countries choose our software to run their business. Our userbase grows each day!
PortfolioDocSpaceTitle: The new way of document collaboration
PortfolioDocSpaceText: A co-working space with customizable rooms for any business purpose. Used to organize an efficient document collaboration with offices, customers, and partners.
PortfolioDocsText: Online editors for text documents, spreadsheets, presentations, forms, highly compatible with MS Office formats, and PDF reader that can replace familiar office suites in an instant.
PortfolioWorkspaceText: A full-featured productivity platform for managing all business processes in-browser with advanced security tools, including encryption at-rest and in-transit. Can be used by companies of all sizes and in all sectors (education, government, healthcare, etc).
ResellerDiscountText: Purchase ONLYOFFICE Docs and ONLYOFFICE Workspace at a discounted price and resell them at great margins.
GetHelpText: Use Partner portal to get all the relevant partner resources and interact with a dedicated support manager who helps solve support issues and get answers to all your questions.
StartupText: Getting started is easy. There is no entry fee to become an ONLYOFFICE partner, nor minimum sales requirements to start.
TrainingAndConsultingText: Request a special training session on using ONLYOFFICE for your team or customers. Request a sales or technical training session for your team. Order a demonstration of using ONLYOFFICE for your customers.
UpdatesText: We provide professional support to our users and partners as well as regular updates for our software.
DealRegistrationText: Get an additional partner discount of 3% and protect your investments by joining the deal registration program.
BringsRewardsText: As a partner, create YouTube videos, translate materials, launch training courses for your customers, write how-to articles on ONLYOFFICE usage and deployment and get rewards from us.
NFRLicenseText: Apply for a not-for-resell license for internal deployment and use ONLYOFFICE within your team.
PartnerLevelsText: Unlock partner benefits depending on your level
CollaborateWithUs: Collaborate with us to promote ONLYOFFICE in your country. Get detailed info on new versions and receive free promo materials, including screenshots, gifs, and video guides. Team up with us to organize online events. In some cases, we can offer joint budget for various activities to share expenses.
FullyTranslated: The interface is fully translated into 30 languages. <0>Check translations</0>
TheLanguageYouNeed: Can’t find the language you need? Contact us at <0>sales@onlyoffice.com</0> to learn more about localizing ONLYOFFICE.
Blog1: ONLYOFFICE partners with Emakin: unparalleled flexibility for document collaboration
Blog2: ONLYOFFICE partners with GenySoft: combining expertise in the legal market
Blog3: ONLYOFFICE partners with Dhorde: providing clients with a better document collaboration solution
ReadyToShip: Ready to ship <0>ONLYOFFICE</0> to your customers?
SubmitYourPartnership: Submit your partnership request and we’ll contact you within 24 hours
StillHaveQuestions: Still have questions? Contact us at <0>sales@onlyoffice.com</0>.
